messages.title: A Labour government will:
messages.content: Freeze energy bills through to 2017, saving the average household £120/year. Set out strict rules for the fair rent of private homes.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freeze energy bills through to 2017, saving the average household £120/year.
Set out strict rules for the fair rent of private homes.
Guarantee a job for the long-term unemployed, paid at least the minimum wage for a minimum of 25 hours.
Cut university tuition fees from £9,000/year to £6,000/year.
Paid for by a mansion tax on homes valued at over £2 million.
Ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher.

issues.education: Cut university tuition fees from £9,000/year to £6,000/year. Ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher.
issues.health: Paid for by a mansion tax on homes valued at over £2 million.

housing.content: Set out strict rules for the fair rent of private homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: The Labour candidate to be your MP.

images.caption: Malcolm Birks - Labour - Fighting for Fairness
